description:
Ryo stumbles upon a pretty ghost named Ami Asaka who tells him that she was murdered by a serial killer. She hires him to protect her younger sister.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fear! Shinjuku Ghost Story!! The Wandering Soul of a Beautiful Woman
Kyoufu! Shinjuku Kaidan!! Samayoeru Bijo no Tamashii
恐怖!新宿怪談!! さまよえる美女の魂
